name: driving_directions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool waze.
Tool description: Get alerts, traffic jams information and driving directions from Waze/Google in real-time.
API description: Fetches driving directions and routes between specified source and destination coordinates using the Waze/Google API.

source_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the starting point.

destination_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the destination.

return_route_coordinates.description: Whether to return route coordinate pairs (`route_coordinates` field)

arrival_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the desired arrival time. Defaults to None, which returns directions for the current time.
